info.author: Ben Brandt <benjamin.j.brandt@gmail.com>
info.name: semantic-text-splitter
info.summary: Split text into semantic chunks, up to a desired chunk size. Supports calculating length by characters and tokens (when used with large language models).

info.author: Ben Brandt <benjamin.j.brandt@gmail.com>
info.name: semantic-text-splitter
info.summary: Split text into semantic chunks, up to a desired chunk size. Supports calculating length by characters and tokens, and is callable from Rust and Python.
